MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 25-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the KY12  postcode area of Dumfermline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to safely carry out repairs to a faulty electrical equipment at mains street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:12am on Wednesday, 25 November 2020
